item.title: Did you know…you can’t do arithmetic operations with datetime2 like with datetime?
item.description: I’m currently working on a SQL code migration from Firebird to SQL Server and I hit an error that I haven’t seen for some time. The error message is the following: This ringed the bell right away! Somewhere on the code someone was trying to do an arithmetic calculation without using the proper function. In the early days of my T-SQL coding, I used to do this a lot. Also, I still see some code from other applications that still use it this way.
